entry.title: Make Textmate your $EDITOR of choice
entry.content:
If you are a master of Vim and feel like a sea-change, or if you're just plain scared, you can set up Textmate as your default editor.

bash export EDITOR='mate -w' export GIT_EDITOR='mate -wl1'. #This instructs TextMate to open with the caret at line 1 rather than where it last was.

Whack this in your .profile (e.g. ~/.bash_profile), re-source it:

bash source ~/.bash_profile

And off you go.
